text:
This occurs on Redhat Linux 8.0. It doesn't happen on Window 2000 (strange?) It 
seems to be the same of #183145. But that one was in 4.1.8 and fixed.

text:
Without steps to reproduce this is invalid. The difference behaviour across 
platforms seems to indicate that this is not a Tomcat issue.
